resources.string: Warning: Your phone sensors may be unreliable.

WIFIRE is a wildfire analysis system that uses satellite and sensor data to monitor weather patterns, which can be used to predict the spread of wildfires.


The purpose of this app is to allow users near wildfire sites to take pictures of the fires and send these pictures to our servers. These pictures can give us more useful data about fires beyond what the satellites can capture, which will be very helpful in future fire predictions.


For more information about WIFIRE, visit wifire.ucsd.edu
